summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to and regulating electrical wiring and equipment, amending Sections 4.100.4, 4.100.14, 4.220.3, 4.230.4, 4.230.32, 4.250.74, 4.331.2, 4.338.3, 4.339.1, 4.339.2, 4.339.3, 4.370.6, 4.370.7, 4.380.13, 4.430.34, 4.500.1, 4.550.12, 4.551.12, 4.555.4, 4.555.9, 4.555.10, 4.600.36, and Example 2 of Chapter 4.910 of the Electrical Code (Ordinance 98305), adding new sections designated Section 4.210.4A and Example 2-A of Chapter 4.910 thereto, redesignating Table 430.148 relating to Direct Current Motors as Table 430.147, and repealing Section 4.351.3 thereof.
